file.name: main.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: 'Example OpenAPI Project'
  version: "1.0"
  description: Example project for OpenAPI Generator Demo

paths:
  '/say-hello/{name}':
    parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: Name of the person to say hello to
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string 
    get:
      summary: Say hello.
      operationId: getHello
      description: Say hello to a given name
      responses:
        200:
          description: Data successfully returned
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'components/schemas/HelloWrapper'
    post:
      summary: Register a new hello type for the given name
      operationId: registerHello
      description: Lets you update the text of the hello for a given name
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'components/schemas/HelloRegisterContainer'
      responses:
        201:
          description: Registration of subscription successful (or already subscribed)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'components/schemas/HelloRegisterContainer'

components:
  schemas:
    HelloWrapper:
      description: Wrapper for a hello
      type: object
      properties:
        content:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
      required:
        - content
    HelloRegisterContainer:
      type: object
      description: Container for a hello-register message
      properties:
        request_hash:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
        message:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
      required:
        - message
        - request_hash

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /say-hello/{name}: get: operation "getHello": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: resolve "components/schemas/HelloWrapper": find schema: external base "components/schemas/HelloWrapper" is not supported
